benchmark_details.name: ChiMed 2.0
benchmark_details.overview: ChiMed 2.0 is a large-scale Chinese medical dataset that integrates both traditional Chinese medicine classics and modern general medical texts, facilitating pre-training, supervised fine-tuning, and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) for medical language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset for training and evaluating Chinese medical language models.

data.source: Data collected from online medical platforms, including traditional Chinese medicine classics and modern medical documents.
data.annotation: Automated processing using language models, including sensitive content cleaning and QA pair generation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model performance on medical benchmark datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Improvement in performance across different model scales indicates effectiveness.
methodology.baseline_results: Qwen-3 models achieved significant performance gains on medical benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Validated through experiments on CMMLU and CEval datasets.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Sensitive content cleaning procedures are implemented to protect user privacy.
